SENT.plain: The largest number of people engaged in sports in Germany play football
There were about 1.5 million sports injuries annually in the previous Federal Republic of Germany
Steinbr√ºck (5) reported that the highest number was found in football players, in whom the injuries of the legs are most frequent
Head and vascular injuries are unusual and seldom in football players
We report on the case of a patient who received an elbow blow from his opponent
He developed a stroke with hemiparesis because of a traumatic dissection of the A. carotis interna
